original_text: And I will give you into their hands, and they shall throw down your vaulted chamber and break down your lofty places. They shall strip you of your clothes and take your beautiful jewels and leave you naked and bare.
korean_text: 내가 또 너를 그들의 손에 넘기리니 그들이 네 누각을 헐며 네 높은 대를 부수며 네 의복을 벗기고 네 장식품을 빼앗고 네 몸을 벌거벗겨 버려 두며

sentences.original_text: And I will give you into their hands
and they shall throw down your vaulted chamber
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너의 높고 넓은 방을 무너뜨리고

sentences.original_text: and break down your lofty places.
They shall strip you of your clothes
and leave you naked and bare.
